nodes.text: Intergalactic travel was travel between galaxies. The Amaxine warriors left the galaxy after they realized they could not defeat the Old Republic, largely because of irrevocable differences between the two. Leia Organa later recalled this event during the Amaxine warrior crisis.

It was said that those who have tried to transverse the space outside the galaxy never returned with the only trace of their travels; distorted messages warning of space hazards like geomagnetic anomalies.
